Package persistence

Class ProductMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • persistence.ProductMapper
  • public class ProductMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class has the purpose of mapping Products from the database to jave objects. General data, such as Cupcakes and intances where all tables are being checked, can be collected through this class. Data regarding Bottoms or Toppings, make use of Bottom and Topping
    Version:
    1.01
    Author:
    rando, Benjamin Paepke
